pages.text: $(bred)Normal Zombie$() is the most common zombie in this mod, $(m)it also looks common$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)20$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : Normal Zombie with $(bgreen)green beard$() has $(l)Normal$() Damage. When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
